sentence.Network_en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentence.Network_cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentence.Network_en: The Internet has proved a blind alley for many firms.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实证明，因特网对许多公司而言是一条行不通的路。

sentence.Network_en: The side alley was walled off from the back garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 侧巷和后花园之间用墙隔开了。

list.abs: 食物单词 - 豆丁网 ... 汉船 seasick 死胡同 blind alley 汉汉小路 path.
由于云云只要死路一条(Blind alley)，衰落的人都是如此做的！懂得美食的人，不会吃全熟的牛排；懂得爱情的人，不会许诺天长地久。
“龙卷风走廊（tornado alley）”（Tornado Alley），是指位于北美大平原位于美国得克萨斯州西部和明尼苏达州之间的一条狭长地带，这片定义模糊的区 …
大约25%的龙卷风在龙卷风巷(Tornado Alley)形成。科罗拉多州就是其中的一部分，周一的龙卷风就在这里出现。
摄魂怪的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... 翻倒巷 Knockturn Alley 对角巷 Diagon Alley 尖叫棚屋 The Shrieking Shack.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 见 street 条 up one's street

jx.jx_en_mean: Compatible with one's interests or qualifications
jx.jx_cn_mean: 相称，合口味：与某人的兴趣或才能相称的

lj.lj_ly: an assignment that is right up your alley.
lj.lj_ls: 一项正好让你去发挥才能的任务

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French alee 'walking or passage', from aler 'go', from Latin ambulare 'to walk'

entry.def: An alley is a narrow passage or street with buildings or walls on both sides.

means.word_mean: 1. a narrow street with walls on both sides
2. a lane down which a bowling ball is rolled toward pins

sentences.en: The line of reasoning will only lead you up another blind alley.
